00008 #include "NetworkConnectionManager.h"
00009 #include <nm-connection.h>
00010 #include <nm-setting-connection.h>
00011 #include <NetworkManager.h>
00012 #include <nm-utils.h>

00014 
00015 NetworkConnectionManager::NetworkConnectionManager(ros::NodeHandle& handle, NMRemoteSettings* remote_settings) :
00016     m_handle(handle), m_remote_settings(remote_settings), msg_seq(0), connection_pub(
00017         handle.advertise<NetworkConnections>("oryx_network_connections", 10, true))
00018 {
00019   ROS_INFO("Initing Network Connection Manager");
00020   publish_connections();
00021   g_signal_connect(m_remote_settings, NM_REMOTE_SETTINGS_NEW_CONNECTION, G_CALLBACK(connection_added_cb), this);
00022 }
00023 
00024 void NetworkConnectionManager::process_added_connection(NMConnection *connection)
00025 {
00026   g_signal_connect(connection, NM_REMOTE_CONNECTION_UPDATED, G_CALLBACK(connection_updated_cb), this);
00027   g_signal_connect(connection, NM_REMOTE_CONNECTION_REMOVED, G_CALLBACK(connection_removed_cb), this);
00028   ROS_INFO("Network Connection Added: %s", nm_connection_get_path(connection));
00029 
00030   NetworkConnection connection_info;
00031   fill_connection_info(connection, connection_info);
00032   connections[nm_connection_get_path(connection)] = connection_info;
00033 
00034   publish_connections();
00035 }
00036 void NetworkConnectionManager::process_removed_connection(NMConnection *connection)
00037 {
00038   //g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func(connection, (gpointer)G_CALLBACK (connection_removed_cb), this);
00039   //g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func(connection, (gpointer)G_CALLBACK (connection_updated_cb), this);
00040   ROS_INFO("Network Connection Removed: %s", nm_connection_get_path(connection));
00041   connections.erase(nm_connection_get_path(connection));
00042 
00043   publish_connections();
00044 }
00045 void NetworkConnectionManager::process_updated_connection(NMConnection* connection)
00046 {
00047   ROS_INFO("Network Connection Updated: %s", nm_connection_get_path(connection));
00048   NetworkConnection connection_info;
00049   fill_connection_info(connection, connection_info);
00050   connections[nm_connection_get_path(connection)] = connection_info;
00051 
00052   publish_connections();
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 void NetworkConnectionManager::fill_connection_info(NMConnection* connection,
00057     oryx_network_manager::NetworkConnection& ros_connection_message)
00058 {
00059   ros_connection_message.path = nm_connection_get_path(connection);
00060   NMSettingConnection* connection_setting = nm_connection_get_setting_connection(connection);
00061   if (connection_setting)
00062   {
00063     ros_connection_message.name = nm_setting_connection_get_id(connection_setting);
00064 
00065     if (nm_connection_is_type(connection, NM_SETTING_WIRELESS_SETTING_NAME))
00066     {
00067       ros_connection_message.connection_type = oryx_network_manager::NetworkConnection::WIFI_CONNECTION;
00068 
00069       NMSettingWireless *connection_wifi_setting = nm_connection_get_setting_wireless(connection);
00070       NMSettingWirelessSecurity *connection_wifi_security_setting = nm_connection_get_setting_wireless_security(
00071           connection);
00072       //NMSetting8021x *connection_8021x_setting = nm_connection_get_setting_802_1x(connection_data);
00073 
00074       if (connection_wifi_setting != NULL)
00075       {
00076         char* ssidTmp = nm_utils_ssid_to_utf8(nm_setting_wireless_get_ssid(connection_wifi_setting));
00077         ros_connection_message.wifi_ssid = ssidTmp;
00078         g_free(ssidTmp);
00079 
00080         if (connection_wifi_security_setting)
00081         {
00082           const char* key_mgmt = nm_setting_wireless_security_get_key_mgmt(connection_wifi_security_setting);
00083           const char *auth_alg = nm_setting_wireless_security_get_auth_alg(connection_wifi_security_setting);
00084           if (!strcmp(key_mgmt, "none"))
00085             ros_connection_message.wifi_security = "WEP";
00086           else if (!strcmp(key_mgmt, "wpa-none"))
00087             ros_connection_message.wifi_security = "WPA/WPA2";
00088           else if (!strcmp(key_mgmt, "wpa-psk"))
00089             ros_connection_message.wifi_security = "WPA/WPA2-PSK";
00090           else if (!strcmp(key_mgmt, "ieee8021x"))
00091           {
00092             if (auth_alg && !strcmp(auth_alg, "leap"))
00093               ros_connection_message.wifi_security = "IEEE 802.1X (LEAP)";
00094             else
00095               ros_connection_message.wifi_security = "IEEE 802.1X (Dynamic WEP)";
00096           }
00097           else if (!strcmp(key_mgmt, "wpa-eap"))
00098             ros_connection_message.wifi_security = "WPA/WPA2-EAP";
00099           else
00100             ros_connection_message.wifi_security = key_mgmt;
00101         }
00102       }
00103     }
00104     else if (nm_connection_is_type(connection, NM_SETTING_WIRED_SETTING_NAME))
00105     {
00106       ros_connection_message.connection_type = oryx_network_manager::NetworkConnection::ETHERNET_CONNECTION;
00107     }
00108     else
00109     {
00110       ros_connection_message.connection_type = oryx_network_manager::NetworkConnection::OTHER_CONNECTION;
00111     }
00112 
00113   }
00114 }
00115 void NetworkConnectionManager::publish_connections()
00116 {
00117   NetworkConnections connections_message;
00118   std::map<std::string, NetworkConnection>::iterator itr = connections.begin();
00119   for (; itr != connections.end(); ++itr)
00120     connections_message.list.push_back(itr->second);
00121   fill_header_message(connections_message.header, msg_seq++);
00122   connection_pub.publish(connections_message);
00123 }
00124 
00125 void NetworkConnectionManager::connection_added_cb(NMRemoteSettings *settings, NMRemoteConnection *connection,
00126     gpointer user_data)
00127 {
00128   NetworkConnectionManager* manager = (NetworkConnectionManager*) user_data;
00129   manager->process_added_connection(NM_CONNECTION(connection) );
00130 }
00131 void NetworkConnectionManager::connection_removed_cb(NMRemoteConnection *connection, gpointer user_data)
00132 {
00133   NetworkConnectionManager* manager = (NetworkConnectionManager*) user_data;
00134   manager->process_removed_connection(NM_CONNECTION(connection) );
00135 }
00136 void NetworkConnectionManager::connection_updated_cb(NMRemoteConnection *connection, gpointer user_data)
00137 {
00138   NetworkConnectionManager* manager = (NetworkConnectionManager*) user_data;
00139   manager->process_updated_connection(NM_CONNECTION(connection) );
00140 }

00142 NetworkConnectionManager::~NetworkConnectionManager()
00143 {
00144   //g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func(m_remote_settings, (gpointer)G_CALLBACK (connection_added_cb), this);
00145   //g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func(m_remote_settings, (gpointer)G_CALLBACK (got_connections_cb), this);
